data.name: WaterTex Pools
data.address: 100 E Felix St Ste 106, Fort Worth, TX 76115

reviews.text: Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.
"The price was excellent, the service was superb, on time, and easy breezy!" "Worst service and unprofessional leadership." "I found Watertex Pool Service through my home warranty and I am so glad!"

My home warranty company sent them out to repair my whirlpool. I only gave two stars because I feel they have great communication, everything else left much to be desired. I feel the technician that came to my home tried to sabotage my … More Response from the owner 3 months ago Thank you for your feedback. We always strive to keep our customers informed and manage expectations through clear communication. … More

We hired WaterTex Pools to come examine a faulty piece of equipment, and WaterTex Pools exceeded my expectations. They identified the cause and fixed it at a great price. Then, when a subsequent fault happened with the part they'd fixed … More

DO NOT DO BUSINESS WITH. HWA sent out watertex pools for a small leak in a union kit for a Hayward North Star. The technician arrived, spun the cap and told the home warranty company that is was “cosmetic/normal wear and tear” and that we … More Response from the owner 3 months ago Thank you for taking the time to leave a review.
